name: Flameline
description:
A metroidvania... in time!

Contols: (explained in game too)

  • Option 1: Arrows - move, C - jump, X - ability 1, Z - ability 2.
  • Option 2: WASD - move, J - jump, K - ability 1, L - ability 2.
  • M - mute music.

How to do stuff: (SPOILER ALERT)

  • Double-jump - First, jump. Then hold Z/L to return back to the position before the jump, then jump again at the same time. You need to line it up to touch the ghost at the highest point of the jump. At that moment, press jump again.
  • Dash - Shoot once, then hold Z/L to return back to the moment before the shot. Then step forward to make sure the shot hits you.
